title: Center for Religious Understanding offers programs, events this fall in new space (The University of ...
text: ( Source : The University of Toledo ) While the mission may be to spread religious understanding throughout campus, it's always helpful to have a place to call home . The University of Toledo's Center for Religious Understanding has a new space
